TopicTitle: Live Stream: The Kerbin Mission, Kerbin Academy...and other stuff !

Hello,

If at some point the stream above drops, try back on my orignal channel here:

Cmdr Zeta...the stream will go on...

Greetings,

KSP V23.5 is now up - this will be the first runs using the new systems...REAL missions are up and running...saved game continues as there wasnt much anways...

Science Career Mode Tree is updated for the new parts...

Let's find an asteroid? Maybe so but it will be awhile before we can grab one...quite a few 100's of science in fact...thus is the career of the Kerbal Space Engineer ...

Stream is up ...

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cdr Zeta

Greetings,

Join me as I show you what I did to possibly solve a Planet Factory fix to allow the new asteroid patch to work...or so we hope...

Otherwiase I am tryi to get to Mun...

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cdr Zeta

Greetings,

I will need to drop a note on the forum about Planet Factory...anyways I managed to get rid os Serious and Joker in the system using Hyperedit; then I stuck the reamining asteroids around some other planets and moons...it looks like the new ones will appear as they are supposed to...ending up near Kerbin at some point later in the missions...what a job it was to figure this out...2 days and notes on this - it still breaks science - no archives and the tree node lines die sometimes - I simply replace it with the master tree I made for my Career Mode and give myself the Science back with Mission Controller, which I now dont use except later for the repair cans maybe...

I am finally playing the game - finally!!

Hop on over an say hi...

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Also sometimes my stream is breaking - I solved that issue too arghh muhaha...if it drops I can bring it back up by restarting it so I am watching...

Cdr Zeta

Hello,

I will do a troubleshooting test with Planet Factory - I increase Serious/Joker velocities to get them out of the system at every game start...I think...its a mess but it works - I think...

The first group of vanilla game asteroids I set them in orbits around other bodies. The rest should appear in their correct orbits we will see today ...

Else I am running Science missions on Kerbin...

Cdr Zeta

Greetings,

Yes indeed...the SUN Serious is now gone thanks to Hyperedit...a simple velocity change to 1gazillion and out she went - along with the Joker too...

Tonite we land on the poles to get Science then make for MUN?!...

Cdr Zeta

Greetings,

Planet Factory fix is finally figured out...I ran up about 80 days of time to generate asteroids for tracking; on game/mission start SUN Serious pops back wanting to mess it up...Luckily heres the solution...

Save game in a folder...get Serious/Joker out of system with Hyperedit - must be done at EACH GAME START (not mission start)...this then also messes up the Science node lines.

Do the changes in MAP mode not in Tracking Station...

Back out of game...replace mission with previous backed up one which may not have the previous-previous Science backup; then restore the prev-prev Scioence backup.

When collecting Science, wait to spend it in the working mission; assure Science node lines are ok; save Science Tree to a folder; dont add any Science during the mission; add Science at the end when yer ready; check it twice; then save the mission in a new folder...then yer ready !

Cdr Zeta

Hello,

So I send Serious out to pasture...that and 80 some asteroids along with it and 6 hours worth of satellite deployment work down the tubes....

I am backtracking again tonite to get PF to work in Science mode...the stream may be good for a laff if anything ya never know.

Cdr Zeta

Greetings,

Collecting Science in a big way ...

Planet Factory is in...no changes made...only have to replace Science Tree each mission load and save it prior to mission end...no problemo...

We still gots plenty of asteroids...our way...!
